name: Bitcoin PC Builder
description:
ONLY PLAY ON A COMPUTER OR INSTALL FROM GOOGLE PLAY STORE!

WEB GL IS NOT SUPPORTED BY MOBILE DEVICES!

__________________________

A PC Builder simulator

Ever dream of building a supercomputer? Well now you can in this Bitcoin PC Builder Simulator. Earn cryptocurrency and use it to upgrade your PC to the most ultimate PC around town. Upgrade your mouse, keyboard, HDD, RAM, GPU and CPU to the highest potential! Become the Bitcoin Master!

Save your progress automatically for when you wish to return!
